swe2013.location
Class Room

java.lang.Object
  swe2013.location.Room

public class Room
extends java.lang.Object

Room Class for managing room information

Author:
Anreiter Simon, Moser Victoria Dorothy, Kocman Andreas

Constructor Summary
Room(long roomNumber, double costPerNight, int size)
          generates a room based on room number, cost per night and number of beds available in that room
Room(long roomNumber, double costPerNight, int size, Bookings bookings)
          generates a room based on room number, cost per night and number of beds available in that room furthermore adds existing bookings to that room

Room

public Room(long roomNumber,
            double costPerNight,
            int size)
generates a room based on room number, cost per night and number of beds available in that room

Parameters:
roomNumber - the room number
costPerNight - the cost per night
size - the size of the room (amount of beds)

Room

public Room(long roomNumber,
            double costPerNight,
            int size,
            Bookings bookings)
generates a room based on room number, cost per night and number of beds available in that room furthermore adds existing bookings to that room

Parameters:
roomNumber - the room number
costPerNight - the cost per night
size - the size of the room (amount of beds)
bookings - bookings for that room
